command.name: Get IP
command.value: echo -n "Docker id: "; read dID && sudo docker inspect -f "{{range .NetworkSettings.Networks}}{{.IPAddress}}{{end}}" $dID

command.name: SH
command.value: echo -n "Docker ID: "; read container_id && sudo docker exec -it "$container_id" sh; unset container_id

command.name: Copy Paste no work
command.value: sudo apt-get autoremove open-vm-tools -y && sudo apt-get install open-vm-tools-desktop -y

command.name: ProcPort
command.value: echo -n "PORT: "; read PORT && sudo lsof -i ":$PORT"; unset PORT

command.name: PID more info
command.value: echo -n "PID: "; read PID && sudo ps -f -p "$PID"; unset PID

command.name: PID cwd
command.value: echo -n "PID: "; read PID && sudo ls -l "/proc/$PID/cwd"; unset PID

command.name: Get Ports from Scan
command.value: echo -n "File: "; read FILE && cat "$FILE" | grep -oP "^\d+(?=/tcp)"; unset FILE
